column4: ok, fresh Ubuntu install, installed latest nVidia driver, and now the Ubuntu bootscreen is low res. What to do?
how did you install the nvidia driver ?
whats the desktop like when you login ?
just the boot screen looks like crud.
ok.. How would you fix that?
with the new plymoth stuff, I'm not %100 certain to be fair
ok one more thing. My cursor is jumping around. A lot. Messing up my typing. I have a touchpad on this laptop(of course) and it's messing me up on both GNOME and KDE.
need to pop out, back in 15, I'll be happy to look into it then
